newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Chart slip drags Wolford to year low.
newsitem.headline: Chart slip drags Wolford to year low.

text.p: Shares in Austria's luxury hosiery and lingerie maker Wolford AG on Monday plumbed a new low for the year after the stock broke a key support level on technical charts, traders said.
With 40 minutes left before the close, Wolford was down 4.7 percent or 55 schillings at 1,115. The previous year low was at 1,150 schillings recorded on April 3.
"Wolford's broken out on the downside according to technical charts, although fundamentals aren't that bad," said one trader.
The relatively low turnover of 8,400 lots indicated that traders were largely behind today's activity. -- Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12256
